title: Los Angeles protesters march by thousands calling for systemic change
description: Thousands of demonstrators took to the streets of Los Angeles, Calif., to protest over George Floyd’s death. Local leaders said progress is being made, but many say that is not enough and are calling for deeper systemic change.
